thread.title: Ground News - No Christmas lights or tree in Bethlehem as festivities are cancelled
thread.title_full: Ground News - No Christmas lights or tree in Bethlehem as festivities are cancelled

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - No Christmas lights or tree in Bethlehem as festivities are cancelled
text:
Summary by Ground News The war flared after a deadly Hamas assault on southern Israel on October 7. Since then, access to Bethlehem and other Palestinian towns in the Israeli-occupied territory has been difficult. Over 20,000 Palestinians have been killed and more than 50,000 wounded during Israel's offensive against Gaza's Hamas rulers. Share menu More
Filters 4 Articles 4 Articles All Left Center Right
Sydney Morning Herald Lean Left High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nine Entertainment Co. No Christmas lights or tree in Bethlehem as festivities are cancelled The biblical birthplace of Jesus resembled a ghost town on Christmas Eve after celebrations in Bethlehem were called off due to the Israel-Hamas war.
